title: G Gradual Men's Fleece Lined Winter Pants with 3 Zipper Pockets Warm Athletic Joggers Workout Running Sweatpants for Men
description: FLEECE LINED & WATER RESISTANT: Upgraded fleece lined keeps you warm and comfortable, perfect for cold weather under 40°F. Durable water repellent finish to repel light rain and keep you dry
3 ZIPPER POCKETS: These winter pants have two side zipper pockets and one back zipper pocket, which easily hold your phone or other essentials. Freeing your hands while you going out or workout

SOFT & STRETCH FABRIC: The fleece lined pants made of soft fabric to provide the most comfortable wearing for you. Crafted with stretchy fabric, ensure flexibility and ease of movement during various activities

ELASTIC WAISTAND & LEG DESIGN: Elastic waistband with adjustable drawstring enable you to adjust your trousers to suit your needs. The tapered leg design with enough length makes you look slim and athletic

MULTI OCCASION: In winter, you can wear fleece sweatpants for workout, running, hiking, cycling, jogging, or lounging at home. The design of winter pants is easy to match with various sports shoes or clothes
